name: Sauced: Cilantro Cream
description: Sometimes it's the simplest of sauces that can save the day. With my chili-spiced skirt steak tacos missing something, this four-ingredient cilantro cream quickly added cool, fresh tang to round out the tacos.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup packed roughly chopped fresh cilantro
1 green onion roughly chopped, green part only

recipeInstructions.text: Place sour cream, lime juice, cilantro, and green onion in the jar of a blender. Puree into smooth. Transfer to a small container and refrigerate until ready to serve.
